content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I recall that there have been no new developments to report since the last update. However, I received the output of the command execute_shell that you executed, which listed all jpg files in the directory. The output shows a list of 12 jpg files, including their file names, sizes, and dates modified.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "mkdir -p jpg_files && mv *.jpg jpg_files/"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -la jpg_files/"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 2180\\ndrwxr-xr-x 2 root root   4096 May 18 08:48 .\\ndrwxr-xr-x 6 1000 rvm   12288 May 18 08:48 ..\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May  7 12:26 00570671-2607-4a0c-b812-72130bb7dde0.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May  7 14:02 02f673e1-f72c-48a6-8f48-efcc62ea2233.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 18 08:28 0ba31036-257a-47ab-b4e7-ad410c4f7829.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May  7 14:05 71bb82fa-a264-41a8-a27a-6525e91dbfe2.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 17 22:03 7ba6ac9e-5a92-4d8d-be65-1c5ffa480707.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May  7 12:29 7e01b329-327c-4d27-8ed9-f6e284324db8.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 18 08:33 7fa46c26-0f90-40cf-bf0f-e54c17b5340a.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 18 01:30 a187a1bd-cf6e-4c6c-8480-da8d603cb92e.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 17 22:52 a5f00507-375e-477f-b768-9c65169a951b.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 17 21:09 cceaa529-cc2d-47dc-b295-2af4bee020ee.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 197109 May 18 08:23 e08d0ecb-92ff-4d4f-b63c-993715c133b4.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     17 May 17 21:10 karate_move.jpg\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     79 May 18 08:34 octopus_image.jpg\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}]
